links.*: Prose Fragments Following the Lost Tales
The Lay of the Children of Húrin

wikitext.*:
'''Fangros''' was an unspecified place where the [[Gnomes]] burned their stolen ships out of repentance, during their [[Exile of the Noldor|flight]] from [[Valinor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in a prose fragment following ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]'', and in ''[[The Lay of the Children of Húrin]]''.<ref name=Fan>{{SM|P3}}, pp. 9-10</ref><ref>{{LB|1c}}, ''verse 631'', p. 31</ref>

An earlier name for the place was ''Fangair''.<ref>{{LB|1c}}, ''note on the verse 631'', p. 49</ref>
